IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Swallowtail School is a community of children, their families, teacher, and friends, united on a well-rounded, rigorous, and creative education from Early Childhood through Eighth Grade. We education a child's head, hand, and heart through an artistic and experiential approach to education. Confident, successful, and motivated, Swallowtail students develop the capacity to work with life's challenges and the needs of fellow human beings with creative intelligence.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Swallowtail school is a community of children, their families, teachers and friends, united by a focus on a well-rounded, rigorous and creative education from early childhood through eighth grade. We educate a child's head, hands, and heart through an artistic and experiential approach to education. Confident, successful and motivated, Swallowtail School students develop the capacity to work with life's challenges and the needs of fellow human beings with creative intelligence.
IRS990.Desc: Pre-K through 8th grade education inspired by the Waldorf system, promoting the intellectual, physical, and spiritual well being of each individual.

OtherExpensesGrp.Desc: Value of non-cash gifts less fundraising event expense

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Swallowtail provides notice of its nondiscrimination policy on its application form, which is reviewed as part of all school tours and is available on the website.
Swallowtail has written procedures for awards of Tuition Assistance. Records of awards are kept.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: State of Oregon Oregon Facilities Authority

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: Refinance existing loan with a SNAP bond loan

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Schedule K, Part IV, Line 2c-08/31/2017 2,457,738 State of Oregon Oregon Facilities Authority
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: 08/31/2017 State of Oregon Oregon Facilities Authority- There is no arbitrage on this bond issue. All funds were immediately used for capital expenditure or temporarily directed to a non-interest bearing account.
Form 8282 for sale of boat filed in 2019.
Form 1098-C for donation of a boat filed in 2019.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: In order to maintain donor confidentiality, Schedule B is omitted from Board review. The entire 990, other than Schedule B, is provided to the entire board electronically prior to submission.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Each year the conflict of interest policy is distributed to all board members, who sign off that they understand and are complying.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Governing documents and financial statements are available upon request with the administrative office.
Write off of unamortized loan cost at time of refinance.
